sense.name: affair, matter, thing 事, 事情
sense.examples:
国事
the affairs of state
我有件重要的事要和你谈谈。
I have an important matter to talk to you about.
还有一件事我想问你。
There is another thing I want to ask you about.

sense.name: accident, trouble, 事故, 事件, 意外事件
sense.examples:
约翰出事了，他被一辆小汽车撞倒了。
John's had an accident: he's been knocked down by a car.
空中失事
air accidents
惹事
make trouble

sense.name: story 故事
sense.examples:
他很少讲有关他自已的身世的(故)事。
He seldom tells his own story.
没人知道他的事
No one knows his story.

sense.name: job, work, 事
sense.examples:
他想找点事做。
He's looking for a job.
有事大家做。
We should all share the work.
